name: FAQ#7
content:
<?xml version="1.0"?>

<root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US" version="1.0">
	<dynamic-element field-reference="question" index-type="keyword" instance-id="5ki0x9OG" name="question" type="text">
		<dynamic-content language-id="en_US"><![CDATA[We want to send you a sample copy of our magazine but can’t find your address.]]></dynamic-content>
	</dynamic-element>
	<dynamic-element field-reference="answer" index-type="keyword" instance-id="WGIdSrLu" name="answer" type="text">
		<dynamic-content language-id="en_US"><![CDATA[Wow, we’re happy to see more of your great publication. Please find our address on the contact page.]]></dynamic-content>
	</dynamic-element>
</root>
